column2: Cohen and Steers Closed End Opportunity Fund Inc

Cohen & Steers Closed-End Opportunity Fund, Inc. (the Fund) is a diversified, closed-end management investment company. The Fund's investment objective is to achieve total return consisting of high current income and potential capital appreciation through investments in the common stock of closed-end management investment companies that invest significantly in equity or income-producing securities. The Fund invests in sectors, including real estate, emerging markets equity, the United States general equity, senior loan, municipal and multi-sector. The Fund's investment manager is Cohen & Steers Capital Management, Inc.
